name: admin.users.session.getSettings
desc: Get user-specific session settings—the session duration and what happens when the client closes—given a list of users.

user_ids.desc: The IDs of users you'd like to fetch session settings for. Note: if a user does not have any active sessions, they will not be returned in the response.

errors.admin_unauthorized: The owner of this token isn't authorized to list sessions.
errors.bots_not_allowed: Bot sessions are not listed by this method.
errors.feature_not_enabled: This method is only available to Enterprise customers.
errors.internal_error: There was an internal error processing this request—please retry.
errors.invalid_arguments: Required arguments either were not provided or contain invalid values.
errors.invalid_auth: The provided token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
errors.restricted_action: The owner of this token isn't an Org Owner or Admin.
errors.not_an_admin: The owner of this token isn't an Org Owner or Admin.
errors.unknown_method: This method is currently not available.
errors.user_not_found: There was an error finding the requested user.
